Accidentaly in love...Counting Crows (ost-Shrek2) So she said what's the problem baby What's the problem I don't know Well maybe I'm in love (love) Think about it every time I think about it Can't stop thinking 'bout it How much longer will it take to cure this Just to cure it cause I can't ignore it if it's love (love) Makes me wanna turn around and face me but I don't know nothing 'bout love Come on, come on Turn a little faster Come on, come on The world will follow after Come on, come on Cause everybody's after love So I said I'm a snowball running Running down into the spring that's coming all this love Melting under blue skies Belting out sunlight Shimmering love Well baby I surrender To the strawberry ice cream Never ever end of all this love Well I didn't mean to do it But there's no escaping your love These lines of lightning Mean we're never alone, Never alone, no, no Come on, Come on Move a little closer Come on, Come on I want to hear you whisper Come on, Come on Settle down inside my love Come on, come on Jump a little higher Come on, come on If you feel a little lighter Come on, come on We were once Upon a time in love We're accidentally in love Accidentally in love (x7) Accidentally I'm In Love, I'm in Love, I'm in Love, I'm in Love, I'm in Love, I'm in Love, Accidentally (X 2) Come on, come on Spin a little tighter Come on, come on And the world's a little brighter Come on, come on Just get yourself inside her Love ...I'm in love "nice" song. very true... ~the greatest thing in the world is to learn how to love and be loved in return.~
Manila day bukas! Walang pasok!!!!!!!!!!!! Today's the day, I'll start my way...the only way for work for play. From now on, from today... Gonna start in my way... HAHAHA
YEhey.papalabas na ang long-awaited "The notebook" at "the prince and me" at "spiderman2" more movies, pang de-tox! Whipee!

What is proclamation 1102??! now I know. but too late. got to study hard and have a grade higher than 60. Bakit sa dami ng tanong, yun pa? kaasar talaga. hahahahahahahaha, twanan nlng. Sir Bong. nagalit kasi samin dahil sa ayaw umamin na nagring na cellphone. pinalagay lahat ng cellphone sa trash can pati ang class list namin. what a day. LAW of THERMODYNAMICS.

Bakit ako nagising???! Kainis na nightmare. WAHH, magaaral na ko mamaya...AGAINST MY WILL. Hirap pala mag-college puro aral, basa, tulog onti tapos gising para pumasok. Masaya pa maging maid sa sariling bahay. hahaha. Malapit na sa breaking point ang utak ko...Insanity. tsktsk, nakakamiss ang highschool. Sana highschool nalang ko forever.

blog:hi Es! Es: Hi there. blog: How's your day today? Es: Okay lang. As usual,maraming nangyari... First, sa theo. Kainis na prelims yan! Wala sa pinag-aralan ko yung mga questions. Buti na lang, may nagsulat ng mga review notes sa board. Sa Eco, walang prof. Kwentuhan lang. Yun ang masayang buhay. Sa PGC, wow. Andami ko talagang natututunan dun. Yung Art II. Sec.27, tungkol yun sa graft and corruption. Tapos, nagkwento na naman si Sir Bong. Nag- tanong daw siya sa klase niya kung ano yung reaksyon nila sa sona. Me nagtaas ng kamay, nagtanong "Sir,me grade ba?". Sabi niya sa student, "Bakit kailangang me grade? Hindi ba bribery yun? Kung walang grade, hindi ka na magrerecite? Bakit ang tao, kailangan mo pang i-bribe para lang gumawa ng tama, hindi ba benepisyo niyo rin naman yun?" Tapos...inaddress naman niya kami, "Bakit kayo andito sa UST? Diba para matuto? Bakit pag walang grade, hindi na kayo mag-aaral?". Inisip ko yung sinabi niya. OO nga no. Bakit ganun? Kung walang grade, hindi ako mag-rerecite. Sinabi pa ni Sir,"Mali nga sa atin eh. Ang pagpapalaki ng anak sa atin ganito, MOM:Anak mag-aral kang mabuti ha. Ibibili kitang cellphone. Maka-graduate ka lang, may kotse ka na. Bakit hindi na lang, MOM:Anak,mag-aral kang mabuti ha. ANAK: Bakit po? MOM: Edi para hindi ka maging mangmang! Gusto mo ba pagtatawanan ka ng tao, saka para pag namatay ako, edi mabubuhay mo sarili mo." Napaisip ako. Kaya siguro mga pilipino, hindi mahilig magtrabaho. Gusto nila may kapalit, natutunan nila sa magulang nila. Aba, oo nga no. blog:Ano pa nangyari sa yo? Es: Sa Political Science, ang hirap intindihin ng sulat nung prof. Saka napansin ko lang, every fri., meron siyang particular na damit na sinusuot. Hahaha. Sa P.E. ko, enjoy.Saya talaga.Tinuruan pa kami ng self-defense. saya. Hindi na ko nagpunta sa tutorial kanina. Nakakaasar kasi eh, baka gabihin ako. Saka sabi nila, hindi naman daw masyadong maganda eh. E di hindi. AAARgh! Nakaka-asar, me make-up class na naman kami sa geo. imbes na matutulog na lang ako eh. tsk. blog:Enjoy ka ba sa UST? Es: Oo naman, andami kong friends dun eh. Pero sa course...hmmm...HIRAP!!! Makapasa lang ako kahit tres, masaya na ko. Tinanong ko nga si mommy eh, "Mommy, magagalit po ba kayo kung lilipat ako ng school?" Sabi niya,"Bakit??!,Nahihirapan ka ba?". Hay nako, yoko nang pa- habain ang usapan namin. Ewan ko ba, hindi naman ako ganto nung hs. Ngayon, kahit todo aral ako, nakakasabit lang. Hindi makaperfect. HAAAY! Buti pa si Kaye. blog:Bakit? Es: Mayabang yun eh, hindi na naman nagaaral. Pero highest sa math. Dalawa lang silang nakapasa sa class. Bakit ganun? blog: Galeng. Es: Pero me tatlong malalaking pimples sa noo. Hahahaha! Kaye: Snoore...ZzZz Es: Tignan mo na, tulog na naman. Ako, gising na gising pa. Haba na nga ng nacompose kong blog eh. Hay, sana palit muna kami ng buhay ni Kaye.....hmmm.... (Es is thinking) Es: Eh pwede nga siguro,magkamukha naman kami eh. Hindi naman siguro mahahalata kung magpapalit kami.HAHAHA. End

hw... walang homework! Pero kailangan mag-aral :( Kainis na sona, habahaba...hindi ko tuloy mapanood fave. show ko. Kung wala lang recitation, hindi ako manonood. Nakakaasar na pimple. malaki at nag-iisa, wah! Hirap ng buhay, ang paglalakad sa mapolusyong highway. nakakahiya sa acc.office, hindi ko alam pano magbayad kasi first time. parang ewan na guard.

saya saya, pinapatugtog ngayon ang dream of me...galeng! buo na araw ko. ~Let me sleep for when I sleep I dream that you are here, you're mine, and all my fears are left behind I float on air, and nightingale sings gentle lullabies so let me close my eyes and sleep a chance to dream so I can see the face I long to touch to kiss, my only dreams can bring me this so let the moon shine softly on the boy I long to see, and maybe when he dreams, he'll dream of me and high beneath the clouds, Id whispher to the evening stars, they tell me "love is just a dream away"...dream away...dream away, a dream away so let the moon shine softly on the boy I long to see and maybe when he dreams, he'll dream of me. OooOooh..dream of me. Kirsten Dunst(Get over it-Midsummer night's dream) Kainis naman si Miles, pinutol agad hindi pa nga tapos eh! kanina naman, one and only...hahaha, wonderful way to start your day--Listen to really good music. Ka village, ka-tambay o kabarangay. Ka- ka- kaheight o kasize kabus ka-jeepney, ka-mrt sa madaling salita whoever you may be ka pizza na naman kita dito rin tayo nagkita diba ~~~ ano yun???!!! sarap ka-pizza up to sawa...ewan!

Our PGC prof. taught us something about life today and every word he said makes sense. "We pray for strength to carry the loads we carry in life. We do not pray for life to be easier for us." I've learned that studying must have a purpose, not to impress but to learn. You must be interested in your course or else have perseverance, then you will survive. Life in college is very different from highschool. Falling down is not an implication of failure. Rather, it is a challenge. If we fall, we may stand up or stay down but no matter what we do, the world will keep on turning and staying down makes us losers. Failing in a subject is not failure but an implication that we should learn more. In a race, staying on the track makes you a winner but if you hate the track, you loose. Maraming questions na mahirap sagutin, lalo na pag concerning life and death. Galing galing! Can't you see? I'm stuck here underneath. You make it hard to breathe.

Quiz sa eco bukas. Report lang ng kaso bukas sa PGC. Yey, hindi muna pagaaralan ang mahabang secII art7-28. Sa tues, quiz whole day. bakit ba nagkasabaysabay pa????!! philo,lit,cwg at eng. sana makapasa... rare item: sana laging may nestea na candy, sarap sarap! great song:dream of me, reminds me of sleeping with wonderful dreams. cute justin, pamangkin kong makulit...hindi tuloy ako makapag-aral. yey! amazing race na uli, hahaha!

on the way to school... We were listening to zoo crew sa magic. Pinapatugtog yung "happy ending" ni avril. hahaha! nakalimutan i censor yung s*** part. I figured out Kyla's lyrics sa "not your ordinary girl" --You're kinda kulet. haha. weird naman. wala siguro silang maisip na mgrhrhyme. ha! Then...sa may school zone. Public eh,nde ako sure kung ano. Muntik na kami makasagasa. hay nako! mahirap talaga kung nagdadalawang isip ka kung tatawid ka o hindi. Yung bata siguro,antok pa. ano nangyari ngayon? kumain akong chicken joy! saya no? yun lang.nothing interesting. t.v. nakakatuwa naman si ashlee simpson. cool! ganda ng o.c. kagabi! every episode nun,natutuwa ako. babaw ko talaga! es,es...tsktsktsk.

Longest weekend ever! Saya,tapos na ang prelims except for one--pol.sci. Essay lang,yahoo! Last fri,walang class. Pinasukan ko pa yung p.e. ko,kaasar! Wala palang p.e..Pahiya tuloy ako.. Pasimple,bumili ako ng iced tea... tindera:Miss,diba wala kayong p.e. ngayon? es:aah..meron po atang checking of attendance(es what are you thinking! what a lame palusot!!!) So...I went to Faith's. We went to centepoint. Nanood ng garfield. Grabe, para akong nag-batang isip. Pangbata yung movie pero tawa ko ng tawa, as in halakhak. Fun movie,sa part nung 'hey mama' hahaha!Still can't get over it. Bummer lang dun, ang panget ni garfield. Hindi kamukha yung cartoon. Totally drained,binili kasi namin ng shirt si Zhen. Haha,sa kid's dept. pa! Sayang fit kasi kung marvin the martian na bibilin namin. So,we got stuck with bugs. Gusto ba niya nun? Anyway, for Abby...capo. She's been asking for that since...March ata yun. Finally, I can fulfill that request. Saturday,sipag ni eS. Party kila Zhen. Hay, dameng bisita. Hindi ko kakilala. Ang awkward talaga dun. Buti na lang andun si Mariel. Fun kasama,yun nga lang, hinid pinapatulan ang corny jokes ko. Heheh! I missed her a lot kaya it's really nice talking to her that day. hmmm...andun kami sa jeep nila zhen at "someone" tapped me. Hmph! Yoko nga pansinin,galit ako sa kanya. Eh, hindi ko naman kayang hindi manlang smile-an. Bait ko no? hehehe..Kasi ba naman. Sa lahat ng mawawalang araw sakin,yung time ko pa with my friends. What did I get from it? Wala! none! zero! grr. Gabi na, dumiretso kami kina Abbs. Nakakatawa naman kami,natakot sa gate nila kasi ang ingay sa loob. Luckily, mga former schoolmate pala namin yun. whew! close one. We handed her "the capo" at pag-open niya: Abby:ano to? Kami: hAhaha. Saya naman, she appreciated it. Ginagamit pa pala niya yung technique ko as capo. pencil and i.d. necklace. so resourceful no? Finally, bedtime. Pero siyempre, walang tulugan! Nag-joke joke-an kami. kantahan(galing ni abby!). ginuitar niya yung mga caedmon's call, sarah machlachlan(spell?hindi ko alam),sountrack ng one tree hill, ng ed, she will be loved, saka balisong.(haaay,reminds me of wet summer days.) Tulog na sila rach at alex(pagod sa field trip) nagkulutan kami. hahahaha! Si rach, ginising namen, bangag pa. Parang addict, namumula mata at wala sa sarili. Hindi daw niya alam kung asan siya,hehe. Hindi man lang napansin yung hair ko. hahaha! Sunday morning... Tugtugan ulit sa salas,saya. me drum set sila, aaah! saya dun. Makakabuo ka na ng banda. me piano pa sila. Tapos nanood na naman kami ng a walk to remember! WAAH, Law of diminishing marg.utility...nakakasawa na pag paulitulit. marg.utility derived is lesser than first viewing. Uuy. me natututunan ako sa eco.! That ends my report. tandadan...:)

I have a very loooong vacation. 4 days to study for political science and the test is just essay type. Yesterday, I went to school thinking that I have a p.e. class. Then I saw the class onstage,all men. AAAAAAHHRG! No arnis. Just sepak takraw. That's so embarrassing. Luckily, no one saw me. So I went straight to Faith's house. We went to centerpoint and watched garfield. Hahaha. The movie made me laugh real hard on the part of odie and garfield's dancing. I still can't get over it,haha! Today, I have two appointments...Zhen's bday @ 3pm and Abby's despedida @3.30. So...haba ng interval. Yey! Overnight kila Abbs!!! Saya,saya! I need to clean the house first and wash my uniforms. Then for two days, I'll study.

bedtime: 1:00am what I lack: Sipag at tiyaga what I have to do: study what I'm doing: nagne-net (obvious ba?) what's the thing I can't keep outta my head: Yung maling sagot ko sa exam sa eco na na-gets ko lang nung natapos na yung time. am I happy?: medyo why?: PGC test was easier than expected what's the thing I regret: going home early, I should have stayed in the lib. why I went home early: Nature calls. hahaha consequence: more distractions here at home, can't study well I'm excited about: watching garfield on saturday with whom: Fatima, sana hindi siya mag-backout! nakakainis: me p.e. pa ko sa fri!!! I feel like: pinching Kaye, ingay eh! ano meron bukas?: test pa rin! I wish I was: omniscient. hahaha impossible. school:went at about 7.15.my test starts at 8.didnt get in the room yet. too noisy there. stayed at the pavillion.studied pgc.noisy crowd.walked.I saw len behind me.thanked me for greeting her a happy birthday.did I?heehee.went in room.crowded.almost everyone was there. no more seat for me.saw zara pointing a seat for me.thanks.studied more.proctor came in early. so happy I made it there first.no permit no test.ha!.I have one.took test.I was like,yey!.easier than expected.went out ahead of time. studied eco.chat with friends. reviewed more. can't concentrate.talked about calcus.weird.Raianne talked about her former school.sheryll talked to us about her lucky charm,but I don't believe in those.then prof went in.we went in.we took the test.mind-boggling. the given in the problem set is mixed up. Grr,lack time.went out about a minute ahead of time.realized I had the wrong answer.oh well.went to photocopy notes.haha.I'm avoided.went to lib to study.helen went home early.she's sick.after a while,I went home. why?. call of nature.rode public vehicles.pollution.went to store. saw kaye. ate at jollibee. went home. finally. watched t.v..played the guitar,never touched a book or a notebook. bad es. lazy girl. that brings me here. writing a blog about my day. so got to stop. to study.I think I have to try Helen's technique of staying awake.extra joss.kinda like drugs. makes you awake,and a bit numb. nah! coffee will do. can't try something I'm not familiar with. So...study na! feels good letting this all out.
